reuters.title: LIFFE T-BOND FUTURES OVER 10 POINTS UP IN UNPRECEDENTED SURGE
reuters.body: Shr 28 cts vs 14 cts Net 3,110,000 vs 1,286,000 Revs 112.7 mln vs 93.8 mln Avg shrs 11.2 mln vs 9,148,000 Nine mths Shr 58 cts vs 15 cts Net 6,377,000 vs 1,332,000 Revs 307.8 mln vs 233.8 mln Avg shrs 10.9 mln vs 9,148,000 NOTE: Company 81.4 pct owned by Primerica Corp <PA>. Reuter 
